languages.text: "На Даргонусе много веков складывалась сложная иерархия среди правящих верхов. Великие дома занимаются не только опустошением вашей казны — она пополняется во многом благодаря их администрированию и владениям. Конечно, вы вправе прогнать любого, чьи действия сочтете никчемными, однако прямо сейчас это может пошатнуть ту хрупкую стабильность, что держится в протекторате".

traits.locale_text: "На Даргонусе много веков складывалась сложная иерархия среди правящих верхов. Великие дома занимаются не только опустошением вашей казны — она пополняется во многом благодаря их администрированию и владениям. Конечно, вы в праве прогнать любого, чьи действия сочтете никчемными, однако прямо сейчас это может пошатнуть ту хрупкую стабильность, что держится в торговой империи".
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Over the many centuries, an intricate hierarchy has formed within the ruling elite of Dargonus. The great houses do more than plunder your treasury — it is replenished, to a large degree, thanks to their administrative work and their lands. Naturally, you can get rid of anyone whom you consider surplus to requirements, but right now, it could threaten the fragile stability that is currently holding the protectorate together."
languages.original_text: "На Даргонусе много веков складывалась сложная иерархия среди правящих верхов. Великие дома занимаются не только опустошением вашей казны — она пополняется во многом благодаря их администрированию и владениям. Конечно, вы вправе прогнать любого, чьи действия сочтете никчемными, однако прямо сейчас это может пошатнуть ту хрупкую стабильность, что держится в протекторате".

traits.locale_text: "Over the many centuries, an intricate hierarchy has formed within the ruling elite of Dargonus. The great houses do more than plunder your treasury — it is replenished, to a large degree, thanks to their administrative work and their lands. Naturally, you can get rid of anyone whose actions you happen to find worthless, but right now, it could threaten the fragile stability that is currently holding the trade empire together."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "Over the many centuries, an intricate hierarchy has formed within the ruling elite of Dargonus. The great houses do more than plunder your treasury — it is replenished, to a large degree, thanks to their administrative work and their lands. Naturally, you can get rid of anyone whose actions you happen to find worthless, but right now, it could threaten the fragile stability that is currently holding the trade empire together."

The great houses do more than plunder your treasury — it is replenished, to a large degree, thanks to their administrative work and their lands. Naturally, you can get rid of anyone whom you consider surplus to requirements, but right now, it could threaten the fragile stability that is currently holding the trade empire together."

traits.locale_text: "Over the many centuries, an intricate hierarchy has formed within the ruling elite of Dargonus. The great houses do more than plunder your treasury — it is replenished, to a large degree, thanks to their administrative work and their lands. Naturally, you can get rid of anyone whom you consider surplus to requirements, but right now, it could threaten the fragile stability that is currently holding the protectorate together."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: “在过去的许多世纪里，达戈努斯精英统治阶层内部形成了错综复杂的等级制度。那些强大的家族所做的事情，并不仅仅是掠夺您的国库。事实上，在很大程度上，正是由于他们的行政工作与他们对领土的管理，您的国库才得以补充。当然，您可以随意消灭那些您认为多余的人，但就目前的情况来看，这可能会让本已脆弱的王朝变得更加分崩离析。”
languages.original_text: "Over the many centuries, an intricate hierarchy has formed within the ruling elite of Dargonus. The great houses do more than plunder your treasury — it is replenished, to a large degree, thanks to their administrative work and their lands. Naturally, you can get rid of anyone whom you consider surplus to requirements, but right now, it could threaten the fragile stability that is currently holding the protectorate together."

traits.locale_text: “在过去的许多世纪里，达戈努斯精英统治阶层内部形成了错综复杂的等级制度。那些强大的家族所做的事情，并不仅仅是掠夺您的国库。事实上，在很大程度上，正是由于他们的行政工作与他们对领土的管理，您的国库才得以补充。当然，您可以随意消灭那些您认为多余的人，但就目前的情况来看，这可能会让本已脆弱的王朝变得更加分崩离析。”
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: «Durante siglos se ha formado una jerarquía compleja entre la élite gobernante de Dargonus. Las grandes casas no se limitan a vaciar su tesorería. Gran parte de los ingresos de la misma se debe a la labor administrativa y a las tierras de estas casas. Naturalmente, si usted considera que alguien es innecesario para sus requisitos, puede librarse de esa persona, pero ahora mismo pondría en peligro la frágil estabilidad que mantiene en pie el protectorado».
languages.original_text: "Over the many centuries, an intricate hierarchy has formed within the ruling elite of Dargonus. The great houses do more than plunder your treasury — it is replenished, to a large degree, thanks to their administrative work and their lands. Naturally, you can get rid of anyone whom you consider surplus to requirements, but right now, it could threaten the fragile stability that is currently holding the protectorate together."

traits.locale_text: «Durante siglos se ha formado una jerarquía compleja entre la élite gobernante de Dargonus. Las grandes casas no se limitan a vaciar su tesorería. Gran parte de los ingresos de la misma se debe a la labor administrativa y a las tierras de estas casas. Naturalmente, si usted considera que alguien es innecesario para sus requisitos, puede librarse de esa persona, pero ahora mismo pondría en peligro la frágil estabilidad que mantiene en pie el protectorado».
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: 「何世紀にもわたり、ダルゴヌスの支配階級の中で複雑な階級が形成されてきました。貴族はなにも陛下の国庫から略奪しているだけではありません――彼らの行政的な業務や所有する土地のおかげで、かなりの割合で国庫を補充している面もあります。もちろん、不要な人材はいつでも排除することは可能ですが、今そのようなことをなされると、保護国家を支えている脆弱な安定性を脅かすことになりかねません」
languages.original_text: "Over the many centuries, an intricate hierarchy has formed within the ruling elite of Dargonus. The great houses do more than plunder your treasury — it is replenished, to a large degree, thanks to their administrative work and their lands. Naturally, you can get rid of anyone whom you consider surplus to requirements, but right now, it could threaten the fragile stability that is currently holding the protectorate together."

traits.locale_text: 「何世紀にもわたり、ダルゴヌスの支配階級の中で複雑な階級が形成されてきました。貴族はなにも陛下の国庫から略奪しているだけではありません――彼らの行政的な業務や所有する土地のおかげで、かなりの割合で国庫を補充している面もあります。もちろん、不要な人材はいつでも排除することは可能ですが、今そのようなことをなされると、保護国家を支えている脆弱な安定性を脅かすことになりかねません」
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Über viele Jahrhunderte hat sich in der herrschenden Elite von Dargonus eine komplexe Hierarchie gebildet. Die großen Häuser plündern Eure Schatzkammer nicht nur – sie füllen sie auch zum Großteil wieder, dank ihrer Verwaltungstätigkeit und ihrer Ländereien. Natürlich könnt Ihr euch aller Personen entledigen, die Ihr für überflüssig haltet, aber im Moment würde das die geringe Stabilität gefährden, die das Protektorat aktuell zusammenhält."
languages.original_text: "Over the many centuries, an intricate hierarchy has formed within the ruling elite of Dargonus. The great houses do more than plunder your treasury — it is replenished, to a large degree, thanks to their administrative work and their lands. Naturally, you can get rid of anyone whom you consider surplus to requirements, but right now, it could threaten the fragile stability that is currently holding the protectorate together."

traits.locale_text: "Über viele Jahrhunderte hat sich in der herrschenden Elite von Dargonus eine komplexe Hierarchie gebildet. Die großen Häuser plündern Eure Schatzkammer nicht nur – sie füllen sie auch zum Großteil wieder, dank ihrer Verwaltungstätigkeit und ihrer Ländereien. Natürlich könnt Ihr euch aller Personen entledigen, die Ihr für überflüssig haltet, aber im Moment würde das die geringe Stabilität gefährden, die das Protektorat aktuell zusammenhält."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: « Au fil des siècles, une certaine hiérarchie s'est mise en place parmi l'élite gouvernante de Dargonus. Oui, les maisons nobles vident vos coffres, mais il ne faut pas oublier que c'est également elles qui les remplissent avec les fruits de leurs terres et de leurs travaux administratifs. Bien entendu, rien ne vous empêchez de vous débarrasser des importuns, mais pour le moment, cela pourrait mettre en péril l'équilibre fragile du protectorat. »
languages.original_text: "Over the many centuries, an intricate hierarchy has formed within the ruling elite of Dargonus. The great houses do more than plunder your treasury — it is replenished, to a large degree, thanks to their administrative work and their lands. Naturally, you can get rid of anyone whom you consider surplus to requirements, but right now, it could threaten the fragile stability that is currently holding the protectorate together."

traits.locale_text: « Au fil des siècles, une certaine hiérarchie s'est mise en place parmi l'élite gouvernante de Dargonus. Oui, les maisons nobles vident vos coffres, mais il ne faut pas oublier que c'est également elles qui les remplissent avec les fruits de leurs terres et de leurs travaux administratifs. Bien entendu, rien ne vous empêchez de vous débarrasser des importuns, mais pour le moment, cela pourrait mettre en péril l'équilibre fragile du protectorat. »
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Geçen yüz yıllar içinde Dargonus'un seçkin yöneticileriyle çetrefilli bir hiyerarşi kurulmuş. Köklü haneler, sırf hazinenize konmaya çalışıyor demeyelim... O hazine, bir yandan da büyük bir ölçüde onların yürüttüğü idari işler ve yönettikleri topraklar sayesinde doluyor. Elbette gerek görmediğiniz herkesi aradan çıkarmasına çıkarabilirsiniz ama şu an bunu yaparsanız protektoranızı ayakta tutan kırılgan dengeyi riske atabilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: "Over the many centuries, an intricate hierarchy has formed within the ruling elite of Dargonus. The great houses do more than plunder your treasury — it is replenished, to a large degree, thanks to their administrative work and their lands. Naturally, you can get rid of anyone whom you consider surplus to requirements, but right now, it could threaten the fragile stability that is currently holding the protectorate together."

traits.locale_text: "Geçen yüz yıllar içinde Dargonus'un seçkin yöneticileriyle çetrefilli bir hiyerarşi kurulmuş. Köklü haneler, sırf hazinenize konmaya çalışıyor demeyelim... O hazine, bir yandan da büyük bir ölçüde onların idari işleri ve toprakları sayesinde doluyor. Elbette gerek görmediğiniz herkesi aradan çıkarabilirsiniz çıkarmasına da, şu an bunu yaparsanız protektoranızı ayakta tutan kırılgan dengeyi riske atabilirsiniz."
traits.speaker: Clemence
